casebody.data:
STATE
v.
ALERS. No. COA06-1708. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed July 3, 2007. Certification Date July 23, 2007. Appeal from the Wake (03CRS12276, 03CRS12277, 03CRS17779, 03CRS17780, 03CRS17781, 03CRS17782, 03CRS17783, 03CRS17784, 03CRS17785, 03CRS17786, 03CRS17787, 03CRS17788).

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed and remanded in part for correction of the order revoking probation.
